page.title: 01LANDSCAPE
page.content:
{Heckington}is a large rural village set on the edge of the fens about six miles from{Sleaford}and fifteen miles from the port{Boston. { The village hosts a two day county type show which usually takes place the last week-end in July.This attracts visitors from many miles around as the main attractions are of national or international repute.
The church,a fine example of a Thirteenth century decorated parish church,boasts an Easter sepulchre a copy of which was displayed at the Great Exhibition at Crystal Palace in 1851.
